Test Name: Endogenous Mucopolysaccharidosis Type I (IDUA [Alpha-L-iduronidase]) Biomarker Reflex, Blood Spot
Purpose: To measure alpha-L-iduronidase enzyme activity in dried blood spots for the diagnosis of Mucopolysaccharidosis Type I (MPS I).
Container: Validated filter paper blood spot collection card
Equipment: Microplate reader (405 nm), incubator (37 Â°C), refrigerated centrifuge, P20 & P200 pipettes, vortex mixer
